div.p:
Antonio:
So, Doctor, it's pretty straightforward.

Dr. Colliver:
Yes it is. The key thing you want to remember is anyone can develop heart disease. And our biology sets the trigger level.

Antonio:
Just to review—if I have a lower trigger level that means I can develop heart disease more easily…

Dr. Colliver:
Yes. And the flip side—if I have a higher trigger level, then I have decreased risk.

Antonio:
But everyone has some level of risk?
